scenes.description: Mori Calliope stands over a defeated Nerissa Ravencroft, delivering a cold judgment.
Nerissa Ravencroft falls through a void.
Nerissa Ravencroft performs 'Roshin Yukai' in a field of glowing blue flowers.

subtitles.original: 奈落の底で
subtitles.english: In the depths of hell

subtitles.original: ストップ！
subtitles.english: Stop!

subtitles.original: Oh, such a misguided fool.
subtitles.english: Oh, such a misguided fool.

subtitles.original: Your reckless ways have brought black doom upon yourself and those most beloved around you.
subtitles.english: Your reckless ways have brought black doom upon yourself and those most beloved around you.

subtitles.original: Blaming your misery on others when your demise was, in fact, forged by your own hands.
subtitles.english: Blaming your misery on others when your demise was, in fact, forged by your own hands.

subtitles.original: While you have earned your death in full,
subtitles.english: While you have earned your death in full,

subtitles.original: it is with pity, not anger,
subtitles.english: it is with pity, not anger,

subtitles.original: that this blade falls upon you.
subtitles.english: that this blade falls upon you.

subtitles.original:
炉心融解
Lyrics: kumata(fred) Music: iroha(sasaki)
subtitles.english:
Roshin Yukai (Meltdown)
Lyrics: kumata(fred) Music: iroha(sasaki)

subtitles.original: 街明かり 華やか エーテル麻酔の冷たさ
subtitles.english: The bustling city and its neon lights, a touch of ether that's cold as ice

subtitles.original: 眠れない 午前二時 全てが急速に変わる
subtitles.english: It's 2 AM and I can hardly sleep cause everything keeps changing rapidly

subtitles.original: オイル切れのライター
subtitles.english: I'm like a lighter that's all out of gas

subtitles.original: 焼けつくような胃の中
subtitles.english: My insides are on fire

subtitles.original: 全てがそう嘘なら
subtitles.english: If only everything was a lie

subtitles.original: 本当に良かったのにね
subtitles.english: Things would be so much better

subtitles.original: 君の首を絞める夢を見た
subtitles.english: I had a dream where these hands of mine were strangling your neck

subtitles.original: 光の溢れる昼下がり
subtitles.english: On a bright, sunny afternoon

subtitles.original: 君の細い喉が跳ねるのを
subtitles.english: I watched your slender throat twitch

subtitles.original: 泣き出しそうな目で見つめていた
subtitles.english: As my eyes welled up with tears

subtitles.original: 核融合炉にさ 飛び込んでみたいと思う
subtitles.english: I want to throw myself into a nuclear reactor

subtitles.original: 真っ青な光 包まれて綺麗
subtitles.english: And its pale blue light would envelop me so beautifully

subtitles.original: 核融合炉にさ 飛び込んでみたら そしたら
subtitles.english: If I could throw myself into a nuclear reactor

subtitles.original: すべてが許されるような気がして
subtitles.english: Then everything might be okay, I might be forgiven

subtitles.original: ベランダの向こう側 階段を昇ってゆく音
subtitles.english: On the other side of the veranda, I hear footsteps ascending the stairs

subtitles.original: 陰り出した空が 窓ガラスに部屋に落ちる
subtitles.english: As the clouds creep over the sunlight, it drips through my window and into my room

subtitles.original: 拡散する夕暮れ 泣き腫らしたような日の赤
subtitles.english: Twilight scatters across the horizon, red like eyes swollen by tears

subtitles.original: 融けるように少しずつ
subtitles.english: Slowly but surely, it's melting away

subtitles.original: 少しずつ死んでゆく世界
subtitles.english: Slowly but steadily, the world is dying

subtitles.original: 君の首を絞める夢を見た
subtitles.english: I had a dream where these hands of mine were strangling your neck

subtitles.original: 春風に揺れるカーテン
subtitles.english: My curtains were swaying gently in the spring breeze

subtitles.original: 乾いて切れた唇から
subtitles.english: Your dry, parched lips mustered up

subtitles.original: こぼれる言葉は泡のよう
subtitles.english: Words that would vanish like foam on the waves

subtitles.original: 核融合炉にさ 飛び込んでみたいと思う
subtitles.english: I want to throw myself into a nuclear reactor

subtitles.original: 真っ白に記憶 融かされて消える
subtitles.english: Into the shining, white light my memories will fade and disappear

subtitles.original: 核融合炉にさ 飛び込んでみたら また昔みたいに
subtitles.english: If I could throw myself into a nuclear reactor, I might be able to sleep like I used to

subtitles.original: 眠れるようなそんな気がして
subtitles.english: And everything might be okay, I feel like I'll be able to sleep again

subtitles.original: 時計の秒針や テレビの司会者や
subtitles.english: The second hand on the clock, and the host on the television

subtitles.original: そこにいるけど 見えない誰かの
subtitles.english: Someone who is there, but I just can't see...

subtitles.original: そこに見えない誰かの
subtitles.english: There's someone there

subtitles.original: 見えない誰かの
subtitles.english: But I just can't see them

subtitles.original: 笑い声 飽和して 反響する
subtitles.english: Their laughter swells and grows into an endless echo

subtitles.original: Allegro agitate
subtitles.english: Allegro agitate

subtitles.original: 耳鳴りが消えない 止まない
subtitles.english: The ringing in my ears won't stop, it won't go away
